about_the_game:
STORY DESCRIPTION


John, a tortured father whose life is turned upside down by the sudden and tragic death of his daughter. Ana, a guilt-stricken mother driven mad by her role in her daughter’s accident. And Barbara, an innocent little girl gone too soon. But just what exactly happened?
A family torn apart by tragedy. Two parents begin to be haunted by strange visions and dreams of their daughter, Barbara. The lines between dream and reality begin to blur, turning life into a living nightmare. This horrifying sequence of events grows more and more sinister, as what is fact and what is fiction becomes more and more unclear. What really happened that day at the lake? The ghost of Barbara is the only voice who knows the truth, but are John and Ana listening?
Are you?

ABOUT THIS GAME


Throughout the game, you can play as all 2 main characters, and they all have a story to tell, but don’t let your eyes and ears deceive you. 2 stories bleed together, and it’s up to you to make sense of this tragic tale before the game ends. Who you believe is up to you, but everybody’s got a secret. Who will lie to you first?

Interactable objects will show a dot in the middle of the screen. However not all the objects that show dot are interactable objects.


You will have multiple choices. Each choice leads to a different ending.

Have issues or questions? Join to Discord channel -

  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: The game has a tricky story and multiple endings that confuse you. But you have an opportunity to figure out what is happening by playing two main characters. Be aware; each character tells you their side story. None of the storytellers are bad characters in their stories. You are the BEST JUDGE!!!
